header.title: State Judicial Agency
header.banner: Important information: Check our latest official notes in the News section

hero.title: State Judicial Agency
hero.description: The official body responsible for defending and representing the State of Chad in all jurisdictional and contentious matters, assisting administrations with legal counsel, and ensuring centralized management of State litigation.
